item.title: 'You'll find out,' Trump says on Greenland takeover strategy
item.description: Trump will be meeting with world leaders at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland later this week.

item.title: Trump speaks at White House press briefing
item.description: President Donald Trump spoke at a White House press briefing marking the first anniversary of his second term in office.

item.title: Greenlanders 'bewildered' by Trump’s 'devastating' takeover threats, business minister tells CNBC
item.description: Greenland has been thrust into the geopolitical spotlight by President Donald Trump's takeover threats, and European nations' response.

item.title: 'Act of great stupidity': Trump launches another tirade against a NATO ally. This time it's the UK
item.description: The White House voiced its support for the deal last year, but on Tuesday, Trump said it was "an act of great stupidity."

item.title: Greenland's freshwater reserves seen as ‘frozen capital’ as water becomes a national security issue
item.description: "Water is increasingly treated like a strategic asset," one analyst told CNBC.
